amendment.description: Amendment to require schools to notify students or parents of minor students when they enter into an agreement with a person or company that is allowed to sell personally identifiable information collected from the application provided to the student.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 113-546 to require schools to notify students or parents of minor students when they enter into an agreement with a person or company that is allowed to sell personally identifiable information collected from the application provided to the student.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
